content: are skipped and the final 9 stitches of the row are worked as purl 2 knit 1 purl 2 knit 1 purl 2 knit 1 continue decreasing like this on every 9th row until you have no remaining leaves see fig 3 for howthisissupposedtolooklike youshouldhave25stremaining continueknittinginthefollowing pattern that should be already established until the shoulder band measures 23 cm from the armpit lift one st repeat *purl 2 knit 1* 8 times bind off stiches figure 3 close-up of the shoulder decreases copyright©linn´eaandersson2024 version1 1 3 3 2 right front pickup the 56 st for the right front piece pick up one stitch in the top of the center leaf and knit in pattern to end 57 sts continue knitting like the left front 3 3 right back pick up 70 st belonging to the right front bind off 13 st knit like left front 3 4 left back knit like right front 4 construction sew together right/left front and right/left back pieces copyright©linn´eaandersson2024 version1 1 4
